about:
Hi, I am Brady Dorsey, a developer based in Houston, TX, with a strong background in logistics and data technology. I am passionate about creating video games and exploring the art of videography in my spare time.

 After graduating from Flatiron School with a certificate in Software Engineering, I have dedicated myself to learning new technologies and building full-stack web applications. My transition into programming was driven by a desire to innovate and make a meaningful impact on the future of technology. Im committed to using my skills to develop innovative solutions that empower businesses to thrive and inspire the next generation of tech.
